articles.title: Rumour: Diablo 2 is getting a remastered release this year - Rock Paper Shotgun
articles.description: Sources close to Blizzard report that 2000 series highlight Diablo 2 will re-release as Diablo 2: Resurrected by the end of this year.
articles.content: Hell might freeze over before we hear more about Diablo IV, but you might not have to wait too long before facing off with the devil once more. Emissaries from Hell (well, France) suggest that Blizzard are working on a remaster of Diablo II, reportedly summon… [+2072 chars]

articles.title: More PS4 and PS5-exclusive games deserve PC releases - TechRadar
articles.description: Opinion: Even if it takes years to happen, it's worth waiting for
articles.content: When Sony announced that Horizon Zero Dawn was coming to PC in March 2020, it buried the news in the second paragraph of an interview with PlayStation's Head of Worldwide Studios Hermen Hulst. Sony wasn't shouting about its newfound support for PC in fact, it… [+5118 chars]

articles.author: Matt Bird
articles.title: Alfa Romeo GT V6 | Spotted - Pistonheads.com
articles.description: Cheaper than a GTA, prettier than a Brera and owned by only the most doting of Alfisti. Form an orderly queue...
articles.content: Although the new Giulia and Stelvio Quadrifoglio are jolly exciting cars for those of who like fast Alfas, there's no escaping the fact that they will cost a lot of money. Not bad value, because £70k or so is what it costs to have more than 500hp in a new car… [+3380 chars]

articles.title: The Last Of Us Actors Nolan North And Troy Baker Headline Dirt 5's Voice Cast - GameSpot
articles.description: The Dirt 5 career mode is going to let you make choices that affect its narrative, and two characters voiced by prolific actors will be there to guide you.
articles.content: Dirt 5 is coming to a variety of platforms, including Xbox Series X, and is supporting Microsoft's cross-generational program Smart Delivery. The game was revealed on the Inside Xbox stream, but it was an interview later in the program that revealed an extens… [+1558 chars]

articles.title: Sonos reveals all-new Arc soundbar...and that's not all that has changed - Express
articles.description: SONOS ARC is the latest soundbar from smart speaker brand Sonos. The new device gets a fresh look and a massive audio upgrade ...and it's not the only new addition to the range. Here is everything that's new.
